myminilogback

Class RollingFileAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • myminilogback.AbstractAppender
      • myminilogback.RollingFileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Appendable

    public class RollingFileAppender
extends AbstractAppender
    Clas of the Rolling File Appender. He lets to setting rules of rotation files.
    Author:
    DantalioNxxi

      • RollingFileAppender

        public RollingFileAppender(File f,
                           File config,
                           boolean isRotation,
                           long maxSize,
                           boolean changeXML)
        Constructor, which uses by LoggerManager at creatRollingFileAppender.
        Parameters:
        f - Where will write logs.
        config - reference to XML-config
        isRotation - If true, then rotation will has happened. By dafult false.
        maxSize - Max size log-file. By default equals one megabyte.
        changeXML - If true, then after each rotate checking of filling file will has happened.
        See Also:
        LoggerManager.createRollingFileAppender(org.w3c.dom.Node)

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(boolean rot,
                        long maxS)
        Changes new rules for file's rotation at this rolling file appender.
        Parameters:
        rot - new condition of rotate.
        maxS - new maxsize for rotation.
